    f1zz0_13
*/

#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <ctype.h>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <limits.h>
#include <fstream>
#include <map>
#include <set>

#define rep(i, a) for(int i = 0; i < a; i++)
#define fo(i, a, b) for(int i = a; i < b; i++)
#define defo(i, a, b) for(int i = a; i >= b; i--)
#define ll long long
#define pb  push_back
#define mp  make_pair
#define sz(a)   ((int)(a.size()))
#define x first
#define y second
#define SET(x, a) memset(x, a, sizeof(x));

using namespace std;

typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;

const int INF = 1e9;

inline int countbit (int n) {
	int c = 0;
	while (n) {
		c++;
		n = n >> 1;
	}
	return c;
}

inline int solve (int a) {
	int c = 0, foo = a;
	while (a > 1) {
		if (a&1) {
			a--;
			c++;
		}
		if (a) {
			a /= 2;
			c++;	
		}		
	}
	// printf("solve %d = %d\n", foo, c);
	return c;
}

int main() {
 	int t, n;
 	cin >> t;
 	while (t--) {
 		cin >> n;
 		int dig = countbit(n);
 		// printf("%d has %d bits\n", n, dig);
 		if (n == 1 << (dig-1))
 			printf("%d\n", dig-2);
 		else {
 			int ans = INF;
 			fo (i, 1, dig) {
 				int a = n & ((1 << i) - 1);
 				int b = n - a;
 				ans = min(ans, max(solve(a), solve(b)));
 			}
 			printf("%d\n", ans);
 		}
 	}
	return 0;
}
